attributes.action: legislate to prevent people being discriminated against based on fingerprint style
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having a national database of fingerprints is dangerous.  With enough data available universities could analyse fingerprints in much the same way that handwriting has been analysed in the past.  A future government that is less benign than this one could then decide to cull all people with certain fingerprint characteristics in the interests of "security".

We think that doing the enabling work for a future cull of this kind is dangerous and should be avoided

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
